response.original_title: i Survived the WORLD'S STRANGEST SCHOOL (Class of 1970)
response.overview: A new girl arrives at a new school, and on her first day, things don't go as she expected. Find out what happens in this twisted, chilling story. Just as you think you know what's happening, things start turning. Watch every episode so you can uncover the truth.
response.title: i Survived the WORLD'S STRANGEST SCHOOL (Class of 1970)
